extinct.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an extinct type of animal or plant does not exist anymore
extinct.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
extinct.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a type of person, custom, skill etc is extinct, it does not exist in society anymore
extinct.translation[0].definitions[2].de: an extinct volcano does not erupt anymore
